cardData.title: customer acquisitionstrong against
cardData.content: Typical marketing automation tools approach customers based on personal information obtained through inquiries. Therefore, it can be said that the approach is centered on real-name customers.'SATORI'In addition to approaching real-name customers, you can also reach out to anonymous customers before making an inquiry.

cardData.title: Installation and operation easy, simple
cardData.content: Since there is no need to design or install a database, you can start operation immediately by embedding measurement tags in your website. The interface has a simple structure, so even novice marketers with little experience in MA operations can use it with confidence.

cardData.title: generous support system
cardData.content: Our specialized staff will provide support on how to use and set up the product.In addition to online help/support, we also hold seminar videos and user meetings, and provide operational support from our staff.
